name: Ace Rider - motor bike racing & stunts
name_original: Ace Rider - motor bike racing & stunts
description:
He's small! He bobbles! He's TOTALLY FEARLESS!

Take control of the AWESOMEST stuntman ever in this exciting 2D motorbike racing game. Blast over challenging tracks, do crazy stunts & win massive points. Start your engines!

FEATURES

- Simple but addictive one-touch gameplay
- 10 unlockable bikes - each with varying speed, acceleration, durability and wheelbase.
- 4 beautiful unlockable tracks: Alps, Desert, Hills & City
- 21 challenging objectives - complete these to get a sticky points multiplier for max points!
- Vertigo-inducing flips, jumps & wheelies
- Realistic physics and engine sounds
- Crazy, challenging tracks
- Game Center leaderboards and achievements

WHAT THEY'RE SAYING

"One touch control and depth by the bucketload." - Gabrien, Touch Arcade Forums.

"a gorgeous little game with a crazy amount of physics crafted into its premise" - Ashley Esqueda, G4.

"a quality game made by developers who clearly know how to design toward a platform’s strengths." - Chris Reed, SlideToPlay.com

"there's a solid chunk of entertainment to be had here." - Mike Schramm, TUAW.com
